product_name: mophie Juice Pack Powerstation PRO Charger
long_description: The Mophie Juice Pack Powerstation PRO charger gives you the confidence that you'll have the power your iPhone 5/5s, iPad(R),tablet or gaming device needs, whenever and wherever it needs it. Impact- and splash-resistant design and 6,000 mAh capacity helps guarantee that no matter where your adventures lead you, your devices will have all the power they need. High-capacity, high-output charge offers up to 2.1 amps. The Mophie Juice Pack Powerstation PRO charger comes with a USB charging cable and user manual.
short_description: The Mophie Juice Pack Powerstation PRO charger gives you the confidence that you'll have the power your iPhone 5/5s, iPad(R),tablet or gaming device needs, whenever and wherever it needs it.
